title: The Truth About AI Getting "Creative"
description: Let's talk about AI Art, Lensa, ChatGPT, and why it's all deeper than you think.  Save money with Karma at  and get double the Karma cash for a limited time!  The sweater:   Search LAION-5B:   Tech I'm using right now:   Intro Track:  Playlist of MKBHD Intro music:   0:00 AI Art vs Creators 1:50 An Incredible AI Chat Bot 3:00 My Take on AI Tools 5:20 The Imperfections 8:20 AI Stealing Art Without Consent 14:08 Karma!  ~
